EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Summon an epic (CR20) creature to aid you. The creature type depends on school familiarity as follows: Abjuration summons an Animated Armor Conjuration summons a Golem Enchantment summons a Succubus Evocation summons a Living Meteor Swarm Illusion summons a Dream Reaver Necromancy summons a Lich Transmutation summons a Gargoyle. Note--the golem sometimes turns hostile and attacks the party. (Cooldown 60 seconds)
